Name: Egg Hop
About the game: Play as a goose who is navigating the dungeon in search of a treasure. Use a mixture of eggs and platforming to solve puzzles, circumnavigate obstacles, and most importantly, avoid death. Which can prove to be quite difficult since you never know what death trap might be lurking behind each corner. But it will all be worth it for the treasure. Eggs: Use eggs to either gain height or hold down buttons. Puzzles Galore: There is a plethora of levels to complete, each with several puzzles inside, varying in difficulty. Infinite Mode: If you run out of fun in the campaign there is an infinite mode where you can test your speed to get a high score.
